prop.name: BaselineDocument
prop.p:
This property defines the default content for the control. Typically this document should contain no text but default colors. An example for the value of this property is:
<Doc> <Content/> <Styles> <Style name="#Default-Override"> <color>#FFFFFF</color> </Style> <Style name="#Selection-Override"> <color>#FFFFFF</color> <bkcolor>#007ACC</bkcolor> </Style> </Styles> </Doc>
It defines a default text color (white) and the selection color (blue) for a control in black background color.

prop.name: CaretColor
prop.p: This color defines the default caret color for the control.
